law.catch_line: The Department shall renew, deny, suspend, or revoke a soft drink registration as provided for the r...
law.text: The Department shall renew, deny, suspend, or revoke a soft drink registration as provided for the renewal, denial, suspension, or revocation of a license under §§ 21-309, 21-311, 21-314, 21-315, 21-316, 21-317, and 21-318 of this subtitle.
